author: Olga Cotaga
title: Concerns Over Syria, Protectionism Hit Popular Investment Strategy
text:
Concerns over tensions in Syria and the threat of protectionism are hitting a popular investment strategy: The carry trade.
As investors look for safety, low-yielding currencies used in this trade, like the yen, Swiss franc and euro, have been mainly gaining against higher-yielding ones, such as the U.S., Australian and New Zealand dollars.
In...
